name: Byte the Osciloscope
description: Byte is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its cat-shaped box body and classic arms and legs, Byte stands out among its fellow robots. Its screen, which also features a cat design, provides a visual representation of electrical signals and waveforms. To add a touch of sophistication, Byte wears a pair of stylish glasses, enhancing its look and functionality. With its impressive abilities and skills, Byte is ready to contribute to the WebtrES club and make a lasting impact in the world of technology.
